name: Tinkerer
info: Increase IP by 2. You may initiate Projects.

data.name: Emergency Item
data.description: Once per conflict scene, if you are in `Crisis`, you may perform an additional action on your turn. This action `must` be the `Inventory` action.

data.name: Gadgets
data.description:
When you first acquire this Skill, choose a gadget type: `alchemy`, `infusions` or `magitech`. You gain its `basic benefits`.
 Whenever you take this Skill again, choose one option: you gain the `basic benefits` of a new gadget type; `or` you gain the `advanced benefits` of a gadget type whose `basic benefits` you already obtained; `or` you gain the `superior benefits` of a gadget type whose `advanced benefits` you already obtained.

data.name: Potion Rain
data.description: When you create a `potion` that restores a `single` creature's HP and/or MP, you may have it affect up to`【SL】`additional creatures. If you do, the potion only restores half the normal amount of HP and MP to each creature.

data.name: Secret Formula
data.description:
When you create a `potion` or `magisphere` whose effects restore HP and/or MP, each restored amount is increased by`【SL × 5】`.
When you create an `elemental shard`, `potion` or `magisphere` that deals damage, that item deals`【SL】`extra damage.

data.name: Visionary
data.description: When you work on a `Project`, up to`【SL × 100】`zenit of material costs are automatically paid; additionally, you generate an additional`【SL】progress` every day. If multiple characters with this Skill work on the same Project, the effects will be cumulative.

data.name: Gadgets - Alchemy
data.description:
You may perform the `Inventory` action to rapidly craft a `potion` with powerful but somewhat unpredictable effects. When you do so, choose one type of `mix` among those you have unlocked (`basic`, `advanced` or `superior`) and spend the appropriate amount of Inventory Points.

When you create a mix, roll the amount of twenty-sided dice indicated by that mix, then assign one of those rolls to the `target` table and one to the `effect` table. Discard all remaining dice, then describe the effects of the mix!

The two effects marked with '`Any`' on the `effect` table are always available and can be chosen if none of the available effects appeal to you.

data.name: Mix
table: Roll two `d20`s and assign one to `target` and one to `effect`.
Roll three `d20`s and assign one to `target` and one to `effect`.
Roll four `d20`s and assign one to `target` and one to `effect`.

data.name: Target
table: ... you `or` one ally you can see that is present on the scene.
... one enemy you can see that is present on the scene.
... you `and` every ally present on the scene.
... every enemy present on the scene.

data.name: Effect
table: Each creature affected by the potion...
... As effect 3, but with poison damage.
... recovers 30 Hit Points and 30 Mind Points.
... treats their `Dexterity` and `Might` dice as if they were one size higher (up to a maximum of `d12`) until the end of your next turn.
... suffers 20 `air` damage. This amount increases to 30 damage if you are `level 20 or higher`, or to 40 damage if you are `level 40 or higher`.
... gains Resistance to `air` and `fire` damage until the end of the scene.
As effect `9`, but with `bolt` and `ice` damage.
As effect 9, but with `dark` and `earth` damage.
... recovers 50 Hit Points and 50 Mind Points.
... recovers 100 Hit Points and 100 Mind Points.

data.name: Gadgets - Infusions
data.description:
When you successfully hit one or more targets with an attack, you may spend 2 Inventory Points to produce a special `infusion` and apply the corresponding effect to that attack (if the attack had the `multi` property, apply the effects of the infusion to each target).

`You cannot apply more than one infusion to the same attack; producing and using an infusion are both part of the action you used to attack with the weapon`.

data.name: Cryo
data.description: The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes `ice`.

data.name: Pyro
data.description: The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes `fire`.

data.name: Volt
data.description: The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes `bolt`.

data.name: Cyclone
data.description: The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes `air`.

data.name: Exorcism
data.description: The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes `light`.

data.name: Seismic
data.description: The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes `earth`.

data.name: Shadow
data.description: The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes `dark`.

data.name: Vampire
data.description:
Choose one option: you recover an amount of HP equal to half the HP loss suffered by the target of the attack; `or` you recover an amount of MP equal to half the HP loss suffered by the target of the attack. 
This infusion can only be used if the attack targeted `a single` creature.

data.name: Venom
data.description: The attack deals 5 extra damage, its damage becomes `poison`, and each creature hit by the attack suffers `poisoned`.

data.name: Gadgets - Magitech
data.description: This invention type grants a variety of different benefits.

data.name: Minor Magispheres
data.description:
Choose `two spells` from the following lists: `Elementalist`, `Entropist`, and `Spiritist`. The spells you choose can come from the same list or different lists; you develop a `magisphere` prototype for each spell chosen this way (this `does not` count as having learned the spells for the sake of Skills and other effects).
You may perform the `Inventory` action and spend 2 Inventory Points to create a `magisphere` and immediately perform the `Spell` action for free, casting one of the spells you have developed a prototype for. The spell follows the normal rules (including MP costs and Magic Checks)

data.name: Magicannon
data.description:
You may perform the 1 action and spend 2 Inventory Points to create a firearm weapon known as a magicannon (see below); if your `hand slots` are empty, you may immediately equip it and perform a `free attack` with it. Every time you create a `magicannon`, choose whether it is a `melee` or `ranged` weapon, and what damage type it deals (`air`, `bolt`, `earth`, `fire`, `ice`, or `physical`); additionally, any other `magicannon` you previously created is destroyed. 

`Magicannon【DEX + INS】+1【HR + 12】`
Two-handed - Melee `or` Ranged - No Quality.

data.name: Superior Magispheres
data.description: Choose `three new spells` from the lists provided by the `minor magispheres` benefit and develop a `magisphere` prototype for each of them. The spells you choose can come from the same list or from different lists (this `does not` count as having learned the spells for the sake of Skills and other effects).
